snippet.title: COCOON | Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
COCOON - An adventure across worlds within worlds. Coming to Xbox, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and PC on September 29th. Add it to your Steam wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1497440/COCOON/

From Jeppe Carlsen, the lead gameplay designer of LIMBO and INSIDE — COCOON takes you on an adventure across worlds within worlds. Master world-leaping mechanics and solve intricate puzzles to unravel a cosmic mystery.

🟠 Learn more: https://www.cocoongame.com
🟢 Twitter: https://twitter.com/playcocoon
🟣 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GeometricInteractive

© Copyright 2023 Geometric Interactive ( https://geometricinteractive.com )
